title: 3.4 Master Challenge 3
question: Create a script to hide and show a sprite. Each time the sprite is shown, a variable named after the sprite’s name will change its value to a multiple of ﬁve. Display the different multiples of ﬁve in increasing order each time the sprite appears.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
